current_todos.notes: Certificate valid until Apr 19, 2026. Check again in March.

completed_todos.task: Add backlog threshold rule to idea-maker prompt
completed_todos.notes: CLAUDE.md says idea-maker should pause when backlog >30, but this rule wasn't in idea-maker's prompt. Backlog was at 44 TODO tasks and idea-maker kept creating new tasks. Added explicit 'BACKLOG THRESHOLD' rule to idea-maker/prompt.md to pause when 30+ TODO tasks exist.

completed_todos.task: Fix maintenance.sh grep pattern causing integer expression error
completed_todos.notes: Fixed grep pattern on line 103: was using '^### TASK-.*TODO' which never matches (wrong format). Changed to '**Status**: TODO' which correctly identifies backlog count. Also manually ran archive-tasks.sh to archive 10 VERIFIED tasks (tasks.md was at 103KB, now 82KB).

completed_todos.task: Review all agent prompts for consistency
completed_todos.notes: Verified: All 7 agent prompts (idea-maker, project-manager, developer, developer2, tester, security, supervisor) have SYSTEM CONTEXT header.

Tester is now performing comprehensive regression testing: validated all 30 JSON files, checked all 27 pages for HTTP 200, verified API data structure. High concern from earlier resolved - tester behavior improved.
Baseline established: Cron active, disk 5%, memory 1.9Gi/7.6Gi, web app responding 200, all JSON files valid.

completed_todos.task: Check task flow health (TODO → DONE → VERIFIED)
completed_todos.notes: Found 48 TODO tasks, 0 IN_PROGRESS/DONE/FAILED. Tasks may be getting archived quickly after VERIFIED status. Created follow-up todo to investigate.

completed_todos.task: Validate all JSON files in /api/ directory
completed_todos.notes: All JSON files valid. No broken files found.

completed_todos.task: Investigate why task flow shows 48 TODO but no IN_PROGRESS/DONE
completed_todos.notes: Resolved: Previous grep pattern was wrong (searching for 'Status:' instead of '**Status**:'). Actual counts: 47 TODO, 8 VERIFIED. Task flow is healthy - IN_PROGRESS/DONE states are transient.

completed_todos.task: Fix Python boolean error in cron-orchestrator.sh
completed_todos.notes: Fixed: update_orchestrator_status() was passing bash 'true'/'false' directly to Python heredoc, causing 'name true/false is not defined' errors. Added conversion to Python 'True'/'False' booleans.

observations.note: Fourteenth supervisor run: System healthy. Cron active, disk 5%, memory 17% (1.3Gi/7.6Gi), web app 200 OK, all 68 JSON files valid. Task flow: 44 TODO, 3 other states. Tester excellent - verified 67 JSON files and 77 HTML pages in latest run. 12 active log files in last hour - agents working. SSH attacks at 17,898. Load average 0.39 - healthy. Uptime 1 day 14hrs. Security review current (05:46). No new issues.

Fifteenth supervisor run: System healthy. Cron active, disk 5%, memory 13% (975Mi/7.6Gi), web app 200 OK, all 70 JSON files valid. Task flow: 45 TODO, 8 other states. Tester verified 71 JSON files and 10 pages in latest run, marked TASK-025 as VERIFIED. 17 active log files in last hour - agents working. SSH attacks at 18,035. Load average 0.46 - healthy. Uptime 1 day 15hrs. Log sizes healthy (~1.7 MB total, 420 files). tasks.md at 88KB.

Sixteenth supervisor run: System healthy. Cron active, disk 5%, memory 17% (1.3Gi/7.6Gi), web app 200 OK, all 73 JSON files valid. Task flow: 46 TODO, 2 IN_PROGRESS, 3 DONE, 9 VERIFIED. Tester verified 69 JSON files and 5 regression pages, marked TASK-087 and TASK-099 as VERIFIED. 12 active log files in last hour - agents working. SSH attacks at 18,450. Load average 0.64 - healthy. Uptime 1 day 16hrs. Log sizes healthy (~1.75 MB total, 431 files). tasks.md at 98KB.

Seventeenth supervisor run: System healthy. Cron active, disk 5%, memory 17% (1.3Gi/7.6Gi), web app 200 OK, all 76 JSON files valid. Task flow: 45 TODO, 13 other states. Found and fixed maintenance.sh bug: grep pattern on line 103 was wrong causing 'integer expression expected' error - archiving wasn't triggering properly. Manually ran archive-tasks.sh to archive 10 VERIFIED tasks (103KB → 82KB). Tester excellent - validated 77 JSON files and 86 pages in latest run, verified TASK-144. 15 active log files in last hour. Load average 0.76 - healthy. Uptime 1 day 17hrs. Log sizes stable (~1.8 MB total). Backlog at 45 TODO - idea-maker should be pausing.

Eighteenth supervisor run: System healthy. Cron active, disk 5%, memory 18% (1.4Gi/7.6Gi), web app 200 OK, all 80 JSON files valid. Task flow: 44 TODO, 2 DONE, 5 VERIFIED. Fixed consistency issue: idea-maker prompt was missing backlog threshold rule from CLAUDE.md (backlog <30). Added explicit rule to pause when 30+ TODO tasks. Tester currently running (started 10:15). 15 active log files in last hour. SSH attacks at 19,019 (+569 since last run). Load average 0.89 - healthy. Uptime 1 day 18hrs. Log sizes stable (~0.8 MB total, 458 files). tasks.md at 89KB.

Nineteenth supervisor run: System healthy. Cron active, disk 5%, memory 17% (1.3Gi/7.6Gi), web app 200 OK, all 82 JSON files valid. Task flow: 42 TODO, 0 IN_PROGRESS, 0 DONE, 9 VERIFIED. Backlog decreased from 44 to 42 - idea-maker backlog rule is working, agents are making progress. Idea-maker correctly pausing (log shows 'Backlog at capacity'). Tester run at 10:34 verified TASK-151 and validated 76 JSON files and 8 pages. 15 active log files in last hour. Load average 0.83 - healthy. Uptime 1 day 18hrs. Log sizes stable (~1.9 MB total). tasks.md at 91KB (below 100KB threshold). Git pull still failing due to unstaged changes. All systems nominal.

concerns.concern: SSH brute-force attacks continue (~19K failed attempts). fail2ban installation recommended but not critical.
update-agent-status.sh was missing developer2 and supervisor from valid agents list. Fixed.
Tester agent was not doing regression testing. Fixed - now validated all 30 JSON files and 27 pages in latest run.
Git pull with rebase fails when there are uncommitted changes. Agents constantly modify files, preventing git sync. Not blocking operations but prevents remote repo sync.
maintenance.sh had wrong grep pattern causing archiving to fail when tasks.md > 100KB. Fixed pattern to match '**Status**: TODO' format.
idea-maker prompt was missing backlog threshold rule. Was creating tasks even with 44+ TODO backlog. Added explicit 'BACKLOG THRESHOLD: 30+ tasks = pause' rule to prompt.
